backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage mixins, access control, and data models for users, deals, buyers, contracts, analytics, plus helper functions and ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component controlling auth flow, startup loading, theme setup, and profile-gated access to the main shell.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Card UI component displaying deal analysis details, MAO calculation, ratings, and comparable sales.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout with sidebar navigation, logout handling, and page routing for the authenticated experience.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays buyer info in a card with contact details, budget, preferred areas, and an edit button.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Dialog for creating, editing, or deleting a buyer with form fields and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of uploaded contracts for a deal with file viewing support.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Allows file selection and upload of contract documents with validation and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Shows key deal information including address, seller, ARV, offer, and estimated profit with edit action.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Dialog for creating or editing a deal, including stage, financials, buyer assignment, and delete option.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: UI card indicating a feature is locked behind a higher membership tier with upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Generates a bar chart summarizing recent monthly profits and estimated fees from deals.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal form for entering and saving a user profile with name, phone, email, and membership tier.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Displays a table of zip codes and corresponding profit totals, or a message if empty.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, a sign‑in button, and value props.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Full‑screen loading indicator showing a spinner and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, deals, buyers, documents, analytics, and related data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining color variables and dark mode themes.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized text constants for navigation labels, errors, empty states, and feature lock messages.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Utility functions for MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fee calculations.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Defines membership-based access checks and limits plus a helper for locked feature messages.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays enterprise-only analytics metrics and a profit-by-zip table with loading and no‑data states.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Shows and manages the buyers list for Pro+ users with editor dialogs and loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Enterprise-only contracts manager allowing deal selection, uploads, and contract listing.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders deal metrics, charts, and membership info summarizing overall pipeline performance.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Provides AI deal analysis input, displays results, and enables creating a deal from the analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Shows deals by stage with add/edit support and enforces Basic plan active-deal limits.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Renders membership plan cards and allows users to switch tiers using profile update mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL or session-based parameters, including hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind styling configuration with custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, state version, and pending requests for the WholesaleAI project.
